Text:
I think we are having an airway obstruction right now. 
The airway pressure is raising over 30 mmHg. 
And the capnogram is showing a delayed rise.
Label: Diagnose pneumothorax

Text: Yes I'm checking the breath sound right now.
Label: Diagnose pneumothorax

Text:
The heart rate (HR) is increasing and reaching 120 Bpm. 
The oxygen saturation (SPO2) is reaching 80%. 
Blood pressure is still in the normal range. 
Surgeon, we need to halt the surgery.
Label: Diagnose pneumothorax

Text:
Yes. I think it is pneumothorax. I can't hear breath sounds on the left/right.
But we don't have time for a chest ultrasound. 
We need to do the needle decompression immediately.
Label: Diagnose pneumothorax

Text:
I need PPEs and betadine solution.
Get me a 16 gauge angiogatheter. 
Then prepare the chest tube set. We will probably need that later.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text:
I'm preparing goggle, face mask, and betadine solution.
Here are the PPEs and the solution.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text: Ok. The PPEs and the solution are ready.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text: Here is the catheter.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text: The catheter is ready.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text: The chest tube set is ready.
Label: Prepare for needle decompression

Text:
The catheter is placed. 
I can feel the air is releasing from the lung. 
Anesthetist, are the vital signs improved?
Label: Check the vital signs again

Text: No. The vital signs are still in the dangerous range
Label: Check the vital signs again

Text: Then we will insert a chest tube.
Label: Check the vital signs again

Text: I need a 10 blade and a hemostatic forceps for incision.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: Here are the 10 blade and the forceps.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: The blade and the forceps are ready.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: Bring me the 32 French chest tube.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: Here is the 32 French chest tube. The chest tube system is also ready to use.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: The chest tube system is working properly.
Label: Make the incision and insert the chest tube

Text: Prepare the sewing kit.
Label: Sew the incision

Text: The sewing kit is ready.
Label: Sew the incision

Text: Anesthetist, are the vital signs improved?
Label: Improved vital signs

Text: Yes, the vital signs are improved.
Label: Improved vital signs
